title.narrative: Foundation and Practitioners Conflict and Stabilisation Courses

description.narrative: This activity (Foundation and Practitioners Conflict and Stabilisation Courses) is a component of Establishing a centre of excellence for Conflict and Stabilisation activity related to fragile and conflict affected states. reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £236,919. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Conciliation Resources, Crown Agents Limited, DCAF, Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office, Saferworld. The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 31-03-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
